info.title: Move focus forwards into a grid in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeGrid
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the grid
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the grid
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Move keyboard focus onto the first non-header cell in the grid.
instructions.raw: Move keyboard focus onto the first non-header cell in the grid.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Transactions January 1 through January 6' is conveyed
Text of the first column header ('Date') is conveyed
Text of the first cell ('01-Jan-16') is conveyed
coordinates of the first cell (column 1, row 2) are conveyed
